channel.title: CVE Feed for Huachu Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huachu Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42336|2024-09-16T16:33:19.781Z -- huachu%20digital%20technology%20co.%2Cltd. -- easytest
item.description: The learning history page of the Easytest is vulnerable by permission bypass. After obtaining a user’s permission, remote attackers can access other users’ and administrator’s account information except password by crafting URL parameters.

item.title: CVE-2021-42335|2024-09-16T19:05:14.166Z -- huachu%20digital%20technology%20co.%2Cltd. -- easytest
item.description: Easytest bulletin board management function of online learning platform does not filter special characters. After obtaining a user’s privilege, remote attackers can inject JavaScript and execute stored XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-42334|2024-09-16T16:17:44.540Z -- huachu%20digital%20technology%20co.%2Cltd. -- easytest
item.description: The Easytest contains SQL injection vulnerabilities. After obtaining a user’s privilege, remote attackers can inject SQL commands into the parameters of the elective course management page to obtain all database and administrator permissions.
